document_data.caption: From left to right: [[Shyressa]], [[Sapphiraktar]], [[Shangalar]], [[Jymahna]], and Rhangaun.
document_data.name: Rhangaun
document_data.mainbody: '''Rhangaun''' was a male [[lich]] and a senior member of the [[Twisted Rune]].
document_data.Description: Dead for more than a thousand years, he was little more than a skeleton with glowing eyes.
document_data.Possessions: He owned a [[staff of the magi]].
document_data.History:
In his mortal life, Rhangaun of [[Almraiven]] was hired to kill [[Cauln Aumar]] of [[Athalantar]] in [[217 DR]].

Forced into the Twisted Rune because [[Rysellan]] possessed his [[phylactery]], Rhangaun took control after the founderâ€™s death.
